column3: Latest;Press release from Child Protection Unit:------Task Force “Echo19” Investigators continue their search for evidence.------We were very fortunate to have been able to obtain the services of “Tommy” a recovery dog and his handler Hin Rattana to assist Task Force members in their search for further evidence in the ------double homicide------ of a grand mother and child that occurred in Kompong Cham on or about the 2nd of April 2019.------It has been a long and protracted investigation with the CPU using all possible resources to investigate this horrific crime.------I wish to thank “Tommy” and Rattana for their hard work today as well as Kompong Cham Police Command and Task Force members. Excellent work by all involved.
